Chinese.Description:
炸弹投出后不会再因为碰撞爆炸，而是在接近任意生物或速度接近静止时爆炸。
主动触发后，将玩家身边的炸弹转化为本轮回生效的地雷，地雷只会被玩家外的生物触发。

English.Description:
Instead of exploding from collision after being thrown, bombs explode when they are near any creature or at a speed close to static.
When triggered, convert nearby bombs into mines that last until cycle end.Mines will only be triggered by other creatures.
